relationships.description: Harry is a student in Lupin's Defense Against the Dark Arts class.
Parents send letters to Hogwarts via owls.
Harry and Lupin have a close relationship, as evidenced by Harry's desire for Lupin to stay at Hogwarts.
The headmaster informs Lupin about Harry's heroic actions the previous night.
